TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant was born in DATE and was detained in the Batman E - Type Prison at the time of his application to the ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was taken into police custody on suspicion of membership of an illegal organisation , the ORG ( ORG Party ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered his detention on remand .

CARDINAL . On DATE the public prosecutor lodged a bill of indictment with ORG against the applicant and CARDINAL other people , charging him with carrying out activities aimed at breaking up the unity of the ORG and removing part of the national territory from the ORG 's control . He requested the court to sentence the applicant in accordance with LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant under LAW of LAW of membership of the ORG and sentenced him to DATE and DATE imprisonment .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of the first - instance court in respect of the applicant and a certain PERSON , holding that the applicant should have been convicted of membership of the ORG and for throwing explosives , under LAW and CARDINAL of LAW . The case against the applicant and PERSON was referred to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court convicted the applicant under LAW and CARDINAL of LAW . It sentenced the applicant to DATE and DATE imprisonment for membership of the ORG and to DATE , DATE and DATE imprisonment for having thrown explosives .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG once again quashed the judgment of the first - instance court .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant under LAW of LAW . However , it acquitted the applicant of the charge under LAW .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's appeal , holding that it had not been submitted within the statutory time - limit .
